alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kankakee; Kendall; La Salle; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:10PM CDT until May 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN KENDALL...NORTHERN LA SALLE...SOUTHERN WILL...NORTHERN GRUNDY AND NORTHEASTERN KANKAKEE COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mendota to near Grant Park, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Joliet, Ottawa, Bourbonnais, Bradley, Morris, Channahon, Minooka, Manteno, Mendota, Braidwood, Wilmington, Coal City, Marseilles, Peotone, Momence, Sheridan, Shorewood, Manhattan, Monee and Beecher. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 62 and 76. I-55 between mile markers 232 and 252. I-57 between mile markers 315 and 332. I-80 between mile markers 87 and 129. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Grundy; Kankakee; Kendall; La Salle; Will
